name: tm39
effect: Teaches Rock Tomb to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rock Tomb to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II & I: Swift)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Stops the foe from moving with rocks. May lower SPEED.
flavor_text.emerald: Stops the foe from moving with rocks. May lower SPEED.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Boulders are hurled at the foe. It also lowers the foe’s SPEED if it hits.
